resources.string: RSA Encryption/Decryption\nRSA Key is generated and saved in Android Keystore\nInput length must be under 64 bytes
AES Encryption/Decryption\nAES Key and IV vector are saved to Shared Preferences (AesKeyStoreImpl). Besides it can be saved to any implementation of AesKeystore.

Description: Password entered by User can be securely verified with Android System Keystore.
First step - create keys.
Then enter a password and 'Sign' the password. Signature of 'Password' can be saved anywhere as it is.
Next enter data to 'Verify Password' and press corresponding button. Entered password and signature are checked with Android Keystore.
Result of verification will be shown on top of the screen.
